name: Backpack Fight
description:
Tutorial

Sorry no time for an in-game tutorial.😔

How to attack?

At your turn,there are attack items appear on the left of stash.
Put the attack you need into your stash to prepare for attack.
most attack items need some turns to prepare.

How to defend?

Above the enemy, there are damage items.
Put them into your stash to avoid getting hurt.

What is the use of weapons??

Weapons give you more attack item at your turn.

Where is my health bar?

your health items are your health points.
